overview: Legendary pornographer Rocco Siffredi has established a new standard of workplace conduct for which the world's offices can strive. In "Rocco's Perverted Secretaries #3," crazy situations and lewd behavior give new meaning to terms like "employee fraternization," "benefits package" and "not safe for work".  Businesswoman Shalina Devine, a long-haired MILF beauty, busts out big boobs for horny aspiring artist Raul Costa to fondle and kiss. Interviewing platinum blonde model Mia Lei, fashion mogul Mike Angelo tries to convince her to display her wares in skimpy attire. He lustfully peels off the shy stunner's top, revealing splendid, natural tits. Dirty blonde secretary Eveline Dellai and bespectacled, sexy Lucette Nice play with a bag of raunchy adult devices. Hard stud Erik Everhard, his sexy, French secretary, Heidi Van Horny, and pretty office assistant Alice Wayne share an outrageous threesome.
title: Rocco's Perverted Secretaries 3
